attributes.action: Further enforce littering in the UK.
attributes.additional_details:
Littering is illegal in the UK. The fine for littering in many areas is £400 (£200 if paid within 10 days). If the fine isn’t paid within 14 days, individuals that
litter could face going to court and paying up to £2500. 

Unfortunately, it is hard to enforce, and many people continue to litter without facing said fines. I would like something to be done to prevent this crime, and to protect our environment.
attributes.background: I would like the Government to take action against littering by further enforcing the fine for the crime.

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign the following petition, which calls for similar action:

Fund more bins, CCTV, enforcement staff and raise fines to prevent littering
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/728466
